text: Jisasɨv ndɨn werer nde mbɨkɨr njɨhi mpɨ han wɨram kehandɨv aŋkarɨpɨr ohɨra kɨvah eŋgwamar. Ave ndɨn mbanave kamar. Amakɨr kɨpɨr han, amɨ aŋkarɨpɨr pamuh nendon amar. Amɨ amakɨr hanɨhan han hɨron uŋkɨ eŋgwamŋgɨz, nsɨham nor han ŋe wɨram kɨra hanɨhan mah han eŋgwarɨmbɨv amar. Amɨ hanave ran, amakɨr hanɨhan imbɨr hamb Yakŋ Ohɨrand Aiampɨra Ohɨra Ñaŋ handɨh ñɨndari amar. Ave yan mpehɨraiv amar.
